verbs.description: [ARG0: CNN 's political analyst Brian Karem] [V: said] [ARG1: that President Trump needed to " shut up " and take his " lumps like a man , " in response to the president 's tweet maligning the press Wednesday . Here 's what he said : " I was gon na say , take your lumps like a man] , " Karem said to CNN 's Brianna Keilar . " I mean , for heaven 's sake , every president faces this . Every president . Every president . " " For a president of the United States to sit there , " he added , " on a day where he should be crowing about a victory , by the way , you know , that 's what his main topic should be . " " Detainees coming home , " Kielar said , referring to the hostages released by North Korea . " The detainees coming home , " he agreed . " So take your victory lap on that , shut up and take your medicine . " " Act like a man , for heaven 's sakes , " he continued . " Every president takes criticism . For you to sit there and then tell us , to question our veracity …

Every president . " " For a president of the United States to sit there , " he added , " on a day where he should be crowing about a victory , by the way , you know , that 's what his main topic should be . " " Detainees coming home , " Kielar said , referring to the hostages released by North Korea . " The detainees coming home , " he agreed . " So take your victory lap on that , [V: shut] up and take your medicine . " " Act like a man , for heaven 's sakes , " he continued . " Every president takes criticism . For you to sit there and then tell us , to question our veracity …
